participant_1.background:
I am a free spirit, and I live my life according to my own rules.
I am ready to work, but my car is not.
i love to workout.
i am married with three kids.

content.text: Hi I am a free spirit, I live my life according to my own rules. How about you?
I enjoy my personal space.  I worked as a clown in the circus.
Wow that's interesting! Did you like being a clown?
It was fun, but I started a small business so I could spend more time with my family.
That's great! What kind of business did you start?
I make and sell custom jewelry.
Oh that's cool! What made you decide to start that business?
I wanted to do something that I was passionate about and that would allow me to have a flexible schedule.
That's awesome! Do you like it?
I love it! It's been a lot of work, but it's been so worth it.
That's great to hear! Do you have any advice for someone who wants to start their own business?
My advice is to find something that you are passionate about and to do your research. Make sure that you have a plan and that you are prepared to work hard.
Thanks for the advice! I'm sure it will come in handy!
No problem! I'm happy to help.
